00052 /* Ripped this from blender.c */
00053 void BLI_movelisttolist(ListBase *dst, ListBase *src)
00054 {
00055     if (src->first==NULL) return;
00056 
00057     if (dst->first==NULL) {
00058         dst->first= src->first;
00059         dst->last= src->last;
00060     }
00061     else {
00062         ((Link *)dst->last)->next= src->first;
00063         ((Link *)src->first)->prev= dst->last;
00064         dst->last= src->last;
00065     }
00066     src->first= src->last= NULL;
00067 }

00069 void BLI_addhead(ListBase *listbase, void *vlink)
00070 {
00071     Link *link= vlink;
00072 
00073     if (link == NULL) return;
00074     if (listbase == NULL) return;
00075 
00076     link->next = listbase->first;
00077     link->prev = NULL;
00078 
00079     if (listbase->first) ((Link *)listbase->first)->prev = link;
00080     if (listbase->last == NULL) listbase->last = link;
00081     listbase->first = link;
00082 }
00083

00085 void BLI_addtail(ListBase *listbase, void *vlink)
00086 {
00087     Link *link= vlink;
00088 
00089     if (link == NULL) return;
00090     if (listbase == NULL) return;
00091 
00092     link->next = NULL;
00093     link->prev = listbase->last;
00094 
00095     if (listbase->last) ((Link *)listbase->last)->next = link;
00096     if (listbase->first == NULL) listbase->first = link;
00097     listbase->last = link;
00098 }

00101 void BLI_remlink(ListBase *listbase, void *vlink)
00102 {
00103     Link *link= vlink;
00104 
00105     if (link == NULL) return;
00106     if (listbase == NULL) return;
00107 
00108     if (link->next) link->next->prev = link->prev;
00109     if (link->prev) link->prev->next = link->next;
00110 
00111     if (listbase->last == link) listbase->last = link->prev;
00112     if (listbase->first == link) listbase->first = link->next;
00113 }
00114 
00115 int BLI_remlink_safe(ListBase *listbase, void *vlink)
00116 {
00117     if (BLI_findindex(listbase, vlink) != -1) {
00118         BLI_remlink(listbase, vlink);
00119         return 1;
00120     }
00121     else {
00122         return 0;
00123     }
00124 }

00127 void BLI_freelinkN(ListBase *listbase, void *vlink)
00128 {
00129     Link *link= vlink;
00130 
00131     if (link == NULL) return;
00132     if (listbase == NULL) return;
00133 
00134     BLI_remlink(listbase,link);
00135     MEM_freeN(link);
00136 }

00139 void BLI_insertlink(ListBase *listbase, void *vprevlink, void *vnewlink)
00140 {
00141     Link *prevlink= vprevlink;
00142     Link *newlink= vnewlink;
00143 
00144     /* newlink comes after prevlink */
00145     if (newlink == NULL) return;
00146     if (listbase == NULL) return;
00147     
00148     /* empty list */
00149     if (listbase->first == NULL) { 
00150         
00151         listbase->first= newlink;
00152         listbase->last= newlink;
00153         return;
00154     }
00155     
00156     /* insert before first element */
00157     if (prevlink == NULL) { 
00158         newlink->next= listbase->first;
00159         newlink->prev= NULL;
00160         newlink->next->prev= newlink;
00161         listbase->first= newlink;
00162         return;
00163     }
00164 
00165     /* at end of list */
00166     if (listbase->last== prevlink) 
00167         listbase->last = newlink;
00168 
00169     newlink->next= prevlink->next;
00170     prevlink->next= newlink;
00171     if (newlink->next) newlink->next->prev= newlink;
00172     newlink->prev= prevlink;
00173 }
00174 
00175 /* This uses insertion sort, so NOT ok for large list */
00176 void BLI_sortlist(ListBase *listbase, int (*cmp)(void *, void *))
00177 {
00178     Link *current = NULL;
00179     Link *previous = NULL;
00180     Link *next = NULL;
00181     
00182     if (cmp == NULL) return;
00183     if (listbase == NULL) return;
00184 
00185     if (listbase->first != listbase->last) {
00186         for (previous = listbase->first, current = previous->next; current; current = next) {
00187             next = current->next;
00188             previous = current->prev;
00189             
00190             BLI_remlink(listbase, current);
00191             
00192             while (previous && cmp(previous, current) == 1)
00193             {
00194                 previous = previous->prev;
00195             }
00196             
00197             BLI_insertlinkafter(listbase, previous, current);
00198         }
00199     }
00200 }
00201 
00202 void BLI_insertlinkafter(ListBase *listbase, void *vprevlink, void *vnewlink)
00203 {
00204     Link *prevlink= vprevlink;
00205     Link *newlink= vnewlink;
00206 
00207     /* newlink before nextlink */
00208     if (newlink == NULL) return;
00209     if (listbase == NULL) return;
00210 
00211     /* empty list */
00212     if (listbase->first == NULL) { 
00213         listbase->first= newlink;
00214         listbase->last= newlink;
00215         return;
00216     }
00217     
00218     /* insert at head of list */
00219     if (prevlink == NULL) { 
00220         newlink->prev = NULL;
00221         newlink->next = listbase->first;
00222         ((Link *)listbase->first)->prev = newlink;
00223         listbase->first = newlink;
00224         return;
00225     }
00226 
00227     /* at end of list */
00228     if (listbase->last == prevlink) 
00229         listbase->last = newlink;
00230 
00231     newlink->next = prevlink->next;
00232     newlink->prev = prevlink;
00233     prevlink->next = newlink;
00234     if (newlink->next) newlink->next->prev = newlink;
00235 }
00236 
00237 void BLI_insertlinkbefore(ListBase *listbase, void *vnextlink, void *vnewlink)
00238 {
00239     Link *nextlink= vnextlink;
00240     Link *newlink= vnewlink;
00241 
00242     /* newlink before nextlink */
00243     if (newlink == NULL) return;
00244     if (listbase == NULL) return;
00245 
00246     /* empty list */
00247     if (listbase->first == NULL) { 
00248         listbase->first= newlink;
00249         listbase->last= newlink;
00250         return;
00251     }
00252     
00253     /* insert at end of list */
00254     if (nextlink == NULL) { 
00255         newlink->prev= listbase->last;
00256         newlink->next= NULL;
00257         ((Link *)listbase->last)->next= newlink;
00258         listbase->last= newlink;
00259         return;
00260     }
00261 
00262     /* at beginning of list */
00263     if (listbase->first== nextlink) 
00264         listbase->first = newlink;
00265 
00266     newlink->next= nextlink;
00267     newlink->prev= nextlink->prev;
00268     nextlink->prev= newlink;
00269     if (newlink->prev) newlink->prev->next= newlink;
00270 }

00273 void BLI_freelist(ListBase *listbase)
00274 {
00275     Link *link, *next;
00276 
00277     if (listbase == NULL) 
00278         return;
00279     
00280     link= listbase->first;
00281     while (link) {
00282         next= link->next;
00283         free(link);
00284         link= next;
00285     }
00286     
00287     listbase->first= NULL;
00288     listbase->last= NULL;
00289 }

00291 void BLI_freelistN(ListBase *listbase)
00292 {
00293     Link *link, *next;
00294 
00295     if (listbase == NULL) return;
00296     
00297     link= listbase->first;
00298     while (link) {
00299         next= link->next;
00300         MEM_freeN(link);
00301         link= next;
00302     }
00303     
00304     listbase->first= NULL;
00305     listbase->last= NULL;
00306 }

00309 int BLI_countlist(const ListBase *listbase)
00310 {
00311     Link *link;
00312     int count = 0;
00313     
00314     if (listbase) {
00315         link = listbase->first;
00316         while (link) {
00317             count++;
00318             link= link->next;
00319         }
00320     }
00321     return count;
00322 }

00324 void *BLI_findlink(const ListBase *listbase, int number)
00325 {
00326     Link *link = NULL;
00327 
00328     if (number >= 0) {
00329         link = listbase->first;
00330         while (link != NULL && number != 0) {
00331             number--;
00332             link = link->next;
00333         }
00334     }
00335 
00336     return link;
00337 }
00338 
00339 void *BLI_rfindlink(const ListBase *listbase, int number)
00340 {
00341     Link *link = NULL;
00342 
00343     if (number >= 0) {
00344         link = listbase->last;
00345         while (link != NULL && number != 0) {
00346             number--;
00347             link = link->prev;
00348         }
00349     }
00350 
00351     return link;
00352 }
00353 
00354 int BLI_findindex(const ListBase *listbase, void *vlink)
00355 {
00356     Link *link= NULL;
00357     int number= 0;
00358     
00359     if (listbase == NULL) return -1;
00360     if (vlink == NULL) return -1;
00361     
00362     link= listbase->first;
00363     while (link) {
00364         if (link == vlink)
00365             return number;
00366         
00367         number++;
00368         link= link->next;
00369     }
00370     
00371     return -1;
00372 }
00373 
00374 void *BLI_findstring(const ListBase *listbase, const char *id, const int offset)
00375 {
00376     Link *link= NULL;
00377     const char *id_iter;
00378 
00379     if (listbase == NULL) return NULL;
00380 
00381     for (link= listbase->first; link; link= link->next) {
00382         id_iter= ((const char *)link) + offset;
00383 
00384         if (id[0] == id_iter[0] && strcmp(id, id_iter)==0) {
00385             return link;
00386         }
00387     }
00388 
00389     return NULL;
00390 }
00391 /* same as above but find reverse */
00392 void *BLI_rfindstring(const ListBase *listbase, const char *id, const int offset)
00393 {
00394     Link *link= NULL;
00395     const char *id_iter;
00396 
00397     if (listbase == NULL) return NULL;
00398 
00399     for (link= listbase->last; link; link= link->prev) {
00400         id_iter= ((const char *)link) + offset;
00401 
00402         if (id[0] == id_iter[0] && strcmp(id, id_iter)==0) {
00403             return link;
00404         }
00405     }
00406 
00407     return NULL;
00408 }

00410 void *BLI_findstring_ptr(const ListBase *listbase, const char *id, const int offset)
00411 {
00412     Link *link= NULL;
00413     const char *id_iter;
00414 
00415     if (listbase == NULL) return NULL;
00416 
00417     for (link= listbase->first; link; link= link->next) {
00418         /* exact copy of BLI_findstring(), except for this line */
00419         id_iter= *((const char **)(((const char *)link) + offset));
00420 
00421         if (id[0] == id_iter[0] && strcmp(id, id_iter)==0) {
00422             return link;
00423         }
00424     }
00425 
00426     return NULL;
00427 }
00428 /* same as above but find reverse */
00429 void *BLI_rfindstring_ptr(const ListBase *listbase, const char *id, const int offset)
00430 {
00431     Link *link= NULL;
00432     const char *id_iter;
00433 
00434     if (listbase == NULL) return NULL;
00435 
00436     for (link= listbase->last; link; link= link->prev) {
00437         /* exact copy of BLI_rfindstring(), except for this line */
00438         id_iter= *((const char **)(((const char *)link) + offset));
00439 
00440         if (id[0] == id_iter[0] && strcmp(id, id_iter)==0) {
00441             return link;
00442         }
00443     }
00444 
00445     return NULL;
00446 }

00448 int BLI_findstringindex(const ListBase *listbase, const char *id, const int offset)
00449 {
00450     Link *link= NULL;
00451     const char *id_iter;
00452     int i= 0;
00453 
00454     if (listbase == NULL) return -1;
00455 
00456     link= listbase->first;
00457     while (link) {
00458         id_iter= ((const char *)link) + offset;
00459 
00460         if (id[0] == id_iter[0] && strcmp(id, id_iter)==0)
00461             return i;
00462         i++;
00463         link= link->next;
00464     }
00465 
00466     return -1;
00467 }

00469 void BLI_duplicatelist(ListBase *dst, const ListBase *src)
00470 {
00471     struct Link *dst_link, *src_link;
00472 
00473     /* in this order, to ensure it works if dst == src */
00474     src_link= src->first;
00475     dst->first= dst->last= NULL;
00476 
00477     while (src_link) {
00478         dst_link= MEM_dupallocN(src_link);
00479         BLI_addtail(dst, dst_link);
00480 
00481         src_link= src_link->next;
00482     }
00483 }

00485 /* create a generic list node containing link to provided data */
00486 LinkData *BLI_genericNodeN (void *data)
00487 {
00488     LinkData *ld;
00489     
00490     if (data == NULL)
00491         return NULL;
00492         
00493     /* create new link, and make it hold the given data */
00494     ld= MEM_callocN(sizeof(LinkData), "BLI_genericNodeN()");
00495     ld->data= data;
00496     
00497     return ld;
00498 }
